name: logohub
description: An open-source brand logo repository service for front-end developers

scripts.build:packages: npm run build:core && npm run build:react
scripts.logo:workflow: npm run logo:source:check && npm run logo:download:available && npm run logo:import:simple
scripts.logo:categories: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const logos = fs.readdirSync('./logos').filter(d => !d.startsWith('.')); const categories = new Set(); logos.forEach(logo => { try { const meta = JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync(path.join('./logos', logo, 'metadata.json'), 'utf8')); categories.add(meta.category || 'uncategorized'); } catch {} }); console.log('📂 Categories:', Array.from(categories).sort().join(', '));"
scripts.website:dev: npm run website:data && vitepress dev docs
scripts.website:build: npm run website:data && vitepress build docs
scripts.validate:all: node -e "const {readdirSync} = require('fs'); const {LogoValidator} = require('./tools/logo-validator'); const logos = readdirSync('./logos').filter(d => d !== '.DS_Store'); console.log('Validating all logos...'); Promise.all(logos.map(async logo => { const validator = new LogoValidator(); const result = await validator.validateLogo(logo); return {logo, success: result.success}; })).then(results => { const failed = results.filter(r => !r.success); console.log(`\n📊 Results: ${results.length - failed.length}/${results.length} passed`); if (failed.length > 0) { console.log('❌ Failed:', failed.map(f => f.logo).join(', ')); process.exit(1); } else { console.log('🎉 All logos validated successfully!'); } });"

author: LogoHub Team
